title: Python Programming Basics
description: This assignment covers fundamental Python programming concepts including input/output, arithmetic operations, and conditional statements.

tasks.title: Sum of Two Numbers
tasks.description:
Write a Python program that reads two integers from input and prints their sum.

Input Format:
Two integers on separate lines

Output Format:
A single integer representing the sum

tasks.title: Even or Odd
tasks.description:
Write a Python program that reads an integer and prints 'Even' if it's even, or 'Odd' if it's odd.

Input Format:
A single integer

Output Format:
Either 'Even' or 'Odd'

tasks.title: Maximum of Three Numbers
tasks.description:
Write a Python program that reads three integers and prints the maximum value.

Input Format:
Three integers on separate lines

Output Format:
A single integer representing the maximum

tasks.title: Essay Question
tasks.description: Explain the difference between a list and a tuple in Python. Provide examples of when you would use each data structure.
